name: Kuala Lumpur
description: Malaysia's capital Kuala Lumpur is known for its skyscrapers and cultural diversity. Rise to the top of the iconic Petronas Twin Towers, explore the bustling streets of Bukit Bintang, or visit the sacred Batu Caves and musjids.

name: Singapore
description: A global financial center with tropical style honored with the name of City of Garden, diverse cultural enclaves, and world-class attractions like Clark Quay, Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios.

name: Shanghai
description: Experience the perfect blend of traditional and modern China in Shanghai, featuring the iconic Bund with the riverview and skylines, ancient gardens, and towering skyscrapers.

name: Tokyo
description: Japan's busy international capital mixes the ultramodern and the traditional , from neon-lit buildings to historic temples. Experience unique japanese culture, shopping, and dining.
